resources.string: Something went wrong. Please try to return back later.\n\nIn case of the issue remains, please write to developer with your device brand and Android version.
Something went wrong with the server response: \n %1$s
Please check your contact and secret. They should not be empty.
Please check ethereum address. It should 64 signs long like `0x62F8DC8a5c80db6e8FCc042f0cC54a298F8F2FFd`.
Enter what do you offer or need
"There is no data for this cell or secret. "
Did you add any offers in your profile? If you didn\'t define your offers, platform could not figure out which demands from others users you are able to full fill.
Did you add any demands in your profile? If you didn\'t define your demands, platform could not figure out in which offers you are interested in.
